channel.title: Comments on: May you stay forever young: or how time, like trains, keeps on moving. With help from Ming Tea, The Seekers, Johnny Cash and Chuck Berry!
channel.description: Supporting children's language, communication and learning

item.title: By: Michael Jones
item.dc:creator: Michael Jones
item.description: Thank you Sue. You are very kind. I'm sure the boys will remember those times too. Trains, train sets and stories about trains are so important for many children. Is it just a boy thing? Michael
item.content:encoded:
Thank you Sue. You are very kind. I’m sure the boys will remember those times too. Trains, train sets and stories about trains are so important for many children. Is it just a boy thing?
Michael

item.title: By: sue
item.dc:creator: sue
item.description: Beautiful writing Michael.I have precious memories of taking my two little boys to watch the trains and this blog has brought them all back. Thank you
item.content:encoded: Beautiful writing Michael.I have precious memories of taking my two little boys to watch the trains and this blog has brought them all back. Thank you
